items.eaAreaName: Devon, Cornwall and the Isles of Scilly

floodArea.riverOrSea: River Coly, River Yarty, Umborne Brook

items.message:
Flooding is possible overnight on Tuesday and into Wednesday morning.
A band of heavy rain is forecasted during Tuesday night and Wednesday morning causing river levels to rise in the River Axe area.
Flooding to low lying land and roads close to rivers is possible from the early hours of Wednesday morning.
We expect rivers to remain high throughout Wednesday.
Take care near the areas of concern and monitor your local weather conditions.
We are constantly monitoring river levels and have staff in the area checking for and clearing blockages in this location. This message will be updated on Wednesday evening or earlier if the situation changes.

items.eaAreaName: Devon, Cornwall and the Isles of Scilly

floodArea.riverOrSea: River Plym, Tory Brook, Long Brook

items.message:
Flooding is possible during the early hours of Wednesday morning.  Heavy rain is forecast from late Tuesday night through Wednesday morning and the rivers Plym and Tory Brook are expected to rise. Forecast levels suggest there could be flooding to low lying land and roads close to the rivers from around 03:00 on Wednesday. Heavy showers and possible thunderstorms are forecast into Wednesday afternoon and therefore we expect the river to remain high. 

Take care near the areas of concern and monitor your local weather conditions. We are monitoring river levels and have staff in the area checking for and clearing blockages. This message will be updated on Wednesday morning or earlier if the situation changes.
